headline: ScaleReady Announces March Biosciences as Recipient of G-Rex® Grant to Advance Manufacturing of Novel CAR-T Cell Therapy
summary: ScaleReady, in collaboration with Wilson Wolf Manufacturing, Bio-Techne Corporation and CellReady, today announced that March Biosciences has been awarded a $200,000 G-Rex® Grant. March Biosciences' G-Rex® Grant will be used to advance the manufacturing of their lead asset, MB-105, a novel investigational autologous CAR-T cell therapy targeting CD5 for patients with T-cell lymphomas.
